NAME: Jyoti Dubey
ABOUT:
Became a Chartered Accountant at the age of 22 and cleared all levels of CA exams in one shot!!
Have been a teacher in troys academy for 5 years teaching accounts to 11th & 12th standard students.

- Ability to conduct research on various income tax matters
- Team player with ability to perform individually.
- Target oriented, punctual and believer of smart-work.
- Excellent communication and inter-personal skills.
